message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000.  I know it's worth a lot to me, but I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on this product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, and I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12500, but I can't go any lower than that. Let me know if you're able to meet me halfway.
